title: GET_PLAYER_INVINCIBLE_2
content:
0xF2E3912B// GetPlayerInvincible_2
BOOL GET_PLAYER_INVINCIBLE_2(Player player);Parameters:player: The player idReturns: A boolean to tell if the player is invincible.Unlike GET_PLAYER_INVINCIBLE this native gets both SET_PLAYER_INVINCIBLE_KEEP_RAGDOLL_ENABLED and SET_PLAYER_INVINCIBLE invincibility state.
codeBlocks:
local player = PlayerId()
-- Example usage for GET_PLAYER_INVINCIBLE_2
GetPlayerInvincible2(player)
